connector.description: Integrate with Consul service discovery and configuration store.

camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeoutMillis.name: camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeoutMillis
camel.sink.endpoint.connectTimeoutMillis.description: Connect timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use connectTimeout instead

camel.sink.endpoint.consulClient.name: camel.sink.endpoint.consulClient
camel.sink.endpoint.consulClient.description: Reference to a com.orbitz.consul.Consul in the registry.

camel.sink.endpoint.key.name: camel.sink.endpoint.key
camel.sink.endpoint.key.description: The default key. Can be overridden by CamelConsulKey

camel.sink.endpoint.pingInstance.name: camel.sink.endpoint.pingInstance
camel.sink.endpoint.pingInstance.description: Configure if the AgentClient should attempt a ping before returning the Consul instance

camel.sink.endpoint.readTimeoutMillis.name: camel.sink.endpoint.readTimeoutMillis
camel.sink.endpoint.readTimeoutMillis.description: Read timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use readTimeout instead

camel.sink.endpoint.tags.name: camel.sink.endpoint.tags
camel.sink.endpoint.tags.description: Set tags. You can separate multiple tags by comma.

camel.sink.endpoint.writeTimeoutMillis.name: camel.sink.endpoint.writeTimeoutMillis
camel.sink.endpoint.writeTimeoutMillis.description: Write timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use writeTimeout instead

camel.sink.endpoint.action.name: camel.sink.endpoint.action
camel.sink.endpoint.action.description: The default action. Can be overridden by CamelConsulAction

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.valueAsString.name: camel.sink.endpoint.valueAsString
camel.sink.endpoint.valueAsString.description: Default to transform values retrieved from Consul i.e. on KV endpoint to string.

camel.sink.endpoint.consistencyMode.name: camel.sink.endpoint.consistencyMode
camel.sink.endpoint.consistencyMode.description: The consistencyMode used for queries, default ConsistencyMode.DEFAULT One of: [DEFAULT] [STALE] [CONSISTENT]

camel.sink.endpoint.nearNode.name: camel.sink.endpoint.nearNode
camel.sink.endpoint.nearNode.description: The near node to use for queries.

camel.sink.endpoint.nodeMeta.name: camel.sink.endpoint.nodeMeta
camel.sink.endpoint.nodeMeta.description: The note meta-data to use for queries.

camel.sink.endpoint.aclToken.name: camel.sink.endpoint.aclToken
camel.sink.endpoint.aclToken.description: Sets the ACL token to be used with Consul

camel.sink.endpoint.password.name: camel.sink.endpoint.password
camel.sink.endpoint.password.description: Sets the password to be used for basic authentication

camel.sink.endpoint.userName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.userName
camel.sink.endpoint.userName.description: Sets the username to be used for basic authentication

camel.component.consul.connectTimeoutMil.name: camel.component.consul.connectTimeoutMillis
camel.component.consul.connectTimeoutMil.description: Connect timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use connectTimeout instead

camel.component.consul.consulClient.name: camel.component.consul.consulClient
camel.component.consul.consulClient.description: Reference to a com.orbitz.consul.Consul in the registry.

camel.component.consul.key.name: camel.component.consul.key
camel.component.consul.key.description: The default key. Can be overridden by CamelConsulKey

camel.component.consul.pingInstance.name: camel.component.consul.pingInstance
camel.component.consul.pingInstance.description: Configure if the AgentClient should attempt a ping before returning the Consul instance

camel.component.consul.readTimeoutMillis.name: camel.component.consul.readTimeoutMillis
camel.component.consul.readTimeoutMillis.description: Read timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use readTimeout instead

camel.component.consul.tags.name: camel.component.consul.tags
camel.component.consul.tags.description: Set tags. You can separate multiple tags by comma.

camel.component.consul.writeTimeoutMilli.name: camel.component.consul.writeTimeoutMillis
camel.component.consul.writeTimeoutMilli.description: Write timeout for OkHttpClient. Deprecation note: Use writeTimeout instead

camel.component.consul.action.name: camel.component.consul.action
camel.component.consul.action.description: The default action. Can be overridden by CamelConsulAction

camel.component.consul.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.consul.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.consul.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.consul.valueAsString.name: camel.component.consul.valueAsString
camel.component.consul.valueAsString.description: Default to transform values retrieved from Consul i.e. on KV endpoint to string.

camel.component.consul.autowiredEnabled.name: camel.component.consul.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.consul.autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.consul.consistencyMode.name: camel.component.consul.consistencyMode
camel.component.consul.consistencyMode.description: The consistencyMode used for queries, default ConsistencyMode.DEFAULT One of: [DEFAULT] [STALE] [CONSISTENT]

camel.component.consul.nearNode.name: camel.component.consul.nearNode
camel.component.consul.nearNode.description: The near node to use for queries.

camel.component.consul.nodeMeta.name: camel.component.consul.nodeMeta
camel.component.consul.nodeMeta.description: The note meta-data to use for queries.

camel.component.consul.aclToken.name: camel.component.consul.aclToken
camel.component.consul.aclToken.description: Sets the ACL token to be used with Consul

camel.component.consul.password.name: camel.component.consul.password
camel.component.consul.password.description: Sets the password to be used for basic authentication

camel.component.consul.useGlobalSslConte.name: camel.component.consul.useGlobalSslContextParameters
camel.component.consul.useGlobalSslConte.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.

camel.component.consul.userName.name: camel.component.consul.userName
camel.component.consul.userName.description: Sets the username to be used for basic authentication
